Name: Group
Documentation:
The AWS::IAM::Group type creates an Identity and Access Management (IAM) group.
This type supports updates. For more information about updating stacks, see AWS CloudFormation Stacks Updates.

Parameters.Name: ManagedPolicyArns
Parameters.Documentation: One or more managed policy ARNs to attach to this group.

Parameters.Name: Path
Parameters.Documentation: The path to the group. For more information about paths, see Identifiers for IAM Entities in Using IAM.

Parameters.Name: Policies
Parameters.Documentation: The policies to associate with this group. For information about policies, see Overview of Policies in Using IAM.

Parameters.Name: GroupName
Parameters.Documentation: A name for the IAM group. For valid values, see the GroupName parameter for the CreateGroup action in the IAM API Reference. If you don't specify a name, AWS CloudFormation generates a unique physical ID and uses that ID for the group name.
